1.0.name: wordpress/kuratur
1.0.description:
Kuratur Connect is a companion WordPress plugin to the Kuratur hosted webpage publishing service.

Curate a webpage comprised of your choice of social media sources such as Twitter accounts or lists, Facebook pages, and RSS feeds. Kuratur keeps your page updated with fresh content from those sources while pulling in the image, headline and summary text from each post to give you a visually engaging page for your visitors.

Kuratur Connect allows you to export your Kuratur page (we call it a "magazine") to a page on your WordPress blog. Now you have a page of hand-curated, relevant, search-engine-friendly, fresh content for your blog that updates itself as often as every hour... all right inside your blog. Set it once and forget it. It's like getting a full-time content curator and marketer for your website.
